text: Allahe kono santana grahana karaa na'i, arau te'omra lagata ana kono ilaha'o na'i; yadi thakilehemtena tente pratyeka ilahe nija nija srstika lai prthaka hai gaâ€™lehemtena arau ejane anajanara oparata praadhan'ya bistara karailehemtena. Sihamte allahara prati yibora araopa karae se'iborara paraa te'om ati paraitra ati mahana
